name: 自我实现特征量表调查
description: 量表验证显示了马斯洛提出的自我实现者的10个特征
instructions: 对于所有问题，请选择以下选项之一
reference: Kaufman, S. B. (2018). Self-Actualizing People in the 21st Century: Integration With Contemporary Theory and Research on Personality and Well-Being. Journal of Humanistic Psychology. https://doi.org/10.1177/0022167818809187
